item.title: Play With Pillow
item.description: Who hasn’t heard PIL? It’s an image processing library made by python (Python Image Library). Pillow is an extension of it.|||||||||| Installation So installing pillow is really easy: pip install pillow Now we are going to do some image processing cool stuff: First Load Image: from PIL import Image, ImageOps img = Image.
